entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
